metadata.title: Evaluate to unknown if the ind-def:unknown_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to unknown if the interpreter properly supports the ind-def:unknown_test and all of its valid operations.

criterion.comment: Test that the unknown_object is supported.

unknown_test.comment: Test that the unknown_object is supported.
